feature.label: zJoule - SAP AI Assistant
feature.description:
zJoule - AI Assistant for Eclipse - Powered by SAP AI Core Generative AI Hub
This Eclipse plugin integrates an AI assistant view directly into your IDE, enabling seamless interaction with SAP AI Core Generative AI Hub foundation models on SAP BTP. Designed for developers, the AI assistant offers a chat-based interface that enhances productivity by providing intelligent suggestions, code explanations, and contextual guidance tailored to your development needs.
--- Key Features:
> Integrated Chat View: Communicate with SAP AI Core Generative AI models for coding assistance, documentation insights, and task automation.
> Developer-Focused: Leverages generative AI capabilities to address common programming challenges and provide actionable recommendations within your Eclipse environment.
> Secure and Configurable: Stores configuration and user preferences securely within Eclipse preferences for a personalized experience.
--- Benefits:
> Accelerate development with on-demand AI-powered assistance.
> Simplify complex tasks and improve code quality with contextual suggestions.
> Enhance your Eclipse IDE with cutting-edge generative AI technologies from SAP BTP.
